tweet: Following Web3, Sergey will be speaking at the @oceanprotocol Berlin offices next week for an event on smart contracts and the privacy layer  https://t.co/OXRNrDp8Ex

Possibilities with ChainLink:  - Connecting all smart contract platforms with external data - Monetizing API's - Off-chain scaling for smart contract platforms - Private smart contracts - Interoperability for blockchains - Smart contracts in any type of currency (fiat or crypto)  https://t.co/AZGuh9Bs3V

Exercise patience $LINK marines. Most of the people who made it off bitcoin were the ones who either forgot about their -then- infinitesimal stacks, or truly understood the impact it would have, and held.
@chainlink @oceanprotocol #chainlink - the most undervalued investment in the history of the world
